tag_list: startup, entrepreneur, ecommerce, consumer-goods, internet, operations
overview:
Entrepreneur & Startup Specialist

With over a decade of hands-on operating and leadership experience in the startup/venture capital world, Brad has gained great experience and enjoyed much success as a business leader, management consultant and internet strategist. In past ventures, he has pumped new life into under-performing companies, as well as built startup companies from the ground up. Brad’s core competencies lie in building lean startups, driving operational efficiency, internet strategy, and business management.

As a principal with Kreutz Ventures, which focused on acquiring and launching small consumer businesses, Brad propelled revenue gains for a number of online entities. He facilitated the startup and acquisition of T-Shirts.com, Cigar.com, Screenprinting.com, Bands.com and Tees.com, along with other related web properties. These experiences extended to the launch of several consumer products, which necessitated the assembly of teams of professionals, implementing operational procedures, and overseeing quality control.

In addition, he have gained valuable consulting and advisory experience with several private equity portfolio companies as a principal with Jet Pack. There, Brad managed in-depth internet strategy analysis and implementation, and worked closely with the portfolio companies to provide hands-on business management consulting.

Brad’s past experience helps him today as he continues to start up new projects and advise clientsâ€”primarily in the consumer, industrial and technology industries. Known for his ability to improve efficiency and maximize return on investment, Brad is a powerful asset to implementing startup and internet solutions.
